title: Strengthening AI Practical Competencies: Multilingual Resume Writing Mastery: Web-Based Project Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Students can write three standard resume formats (reverse-chronological/chronological) for target languages.
Learners can use web-based tools to create documents reflecting culture-specific resume requirements (e.g., EU CV, U.S. Resume, Japanese resume).
Participants can complete multilingual resumes incorporating over 50 job-related keywords accurately, incorporating peer feedback.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
